headline: Digital Realty Announces Redemption of 2.500% Guaranteed Notes due 2026
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Digital Realty (NYSE: DLR), the largest global provider of cloud- and carrier-neutral data center, colocation and interconnection solutions, announced today that Digital Euro Finco, LLC, a wholly owned indirect finance subsidiary of Digital Realty’s operating partnership, has given notice of its intention to redeem all of its outstanding 2.500% Guaranteed Notes due 2026, pursuant to its option under the indenture governing the 2.500% notes, dated

raw.headline: Digital Realty Announces Redemption of 2.500% Guaranteed Notes due 2026
raw.summary: AUSTIN, Texas, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Digital Realty (NYSE: DLR), the largest global provider of cloud- and carrier-neutral data center, colocation and interconnection solutions, announced today that Digital Euro Finco, LLC, a wholly owned indirect finance subsidiary of Digital Realty’s operating partnership, has given notice of its intention to redeem all of its outstanding 2.500% Guaranteed Notes due 2026, pursuant to its option under the indenture governing the 2.500% notes, dated

headline: The Bull Case For Digital Realty Trust (DLR) Could Change Following Massive India AI Data Center Push
summary: Recently, Digital Realty Trust revealed a joint venture with Reliance Industries and Brookfield Corporation to invest US$11.00 billion in AI-focused data capacity in Andhra Pradesh, India, alongside a US$373.00 million power equipment supply agreement with Schneider Electric and an expanded AI infrastructure collaboration with NVIDIA in Northern Virginia. Together, these moves suggest Digital Realty is working to secure key power equipment, hyperscale partners, and AI workloads across both...

headline: Is Digital Realty Trust Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: Although Digital Realty Trust has underperformed the broader Nasdaq Composite recently, analysts remain moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
